price: Mu by’ukuri muri ibyo (kurokora abemeye no kurimbura abahakanye) harimo ibimenyetso (bigaragaza ubushobozi bwa Allah). Kandi mu by’ukuri tugerageza (abantu).
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
